page.title: 07WAY OF LIFE.
page.content: The people who live in Oulton Broad are housewives, civil servants, retired or at college. They travel two or three miles to work or school. Usually they get up between 7 and 8. They never have cooked breakfast. People get to work by car. They come home from work before 5pm. At night they have a medium evening meal. They watch television for two or three hours. People listen to the radio for one hour. Most people's hobbies in Oulton Broad are gardening, boating, windsurfing and fishing. They spend about an hour on their hobbies a day and half an hour on household chores. Most people eat in a restaurant once a month and enjoy a social drink in a pub once a week.
